definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

pinyin: xu1 ni3 xian4 shi2 zhi4 biao1 yu3 yan2

sentences.english: Sing a song, Revision the target language in lesson 8 .
sentences.chinese: 目的是复习第8课的目标语言，引出新课。

sentences.english: Long streamers hung from the tops of tall buildings.
sentences.chinese: 长幅标语从高高的楼顶上垂挂下来。

sentences.english: "Just for you" is the slogan of this year's NDP conference.
sentences.chinese: “只是为了你”是今年民族民主党会议的标语。

sentences.english: It is easy to find relevant material in the target language on the Web and elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 在网上和其他地方找到目标语言的相关资料很容易。

sentences.english: When the weather warms up, ice cream shops have lines out their doors.
sentences.chinese: 当天气渐暖，冰激淋店在外面贴出大幅标语。

sentences.english: The tagline is about creating our legacy.
sentences.chinese: 标语是关于创造我们的财富。

sentences.english: Police reportedly also questioned school staff about the slogan-writing graffiti incident.
sentences.chinese: 据闻警方还就乱涂乱画标语事件向学校职员询问。

sentences.english: Don't always say the catchwords and slogans that are not real.
sentences.chinese: 虚的口号或标语不要常挂嘴上。

sentences.english: “Sensible” is not the criterion for a placard.
sentences.chinese: “是否合理”并非是评判宣传标语好坏的标准。

sentences.english: Prominent anti-American slogans in Tienanmen Square have still not been taken down.
sentences.chinese: 天安门广场上显眼的反美标语仍没有被撤下。

sentences.english: There you can see the slogan written up on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 在那儿你会看到这条标语写在墙上。

sentences.english: Their red and yellow banners show their solidarity with the quake victims.
sentences.chinese: 他们的红底黄字标语展示他们同灾区人民站在一起。

sentences.english: A translator must be well acquainted with the target language.
sentences.chinese: 一个好的译者必须很熟悉目标语言。

sentences.english: Getting existing similar material in the target language is quite nice.
sentences.chinese: 如能拿到现有的目标语言的类似资料的话最好。

sentences.english: I didn't see one global warming placard in Parliament Square the other day.
sentences.chinese: 前几天，我并没有在议会广场看到全球暖化的标语。

sentences.english: How can a club put this motto into action?
sentences.chinese: 一个扶轮社应如何将标语转换成行动？

definition: model or template character/written slogan or phrase/mention (e.g. "air mail" 航空 on a letter, "first draft" 初稿 on a document etc)
Quotations from Chairman Mao Tse-Tung, published from 1964 to about 1976
